text: Yun Song-mi (; born 28 January 1992) is a North Korean football defender. She played for the North Korea women's national football team and at club level for for Pyongyang City. She represented North Korea at among other the 2007 FIFA Women's World Cup and 2012 Summer Olympics.北 윤송미 '측면 돌파' At the 2012 Olympic qualification tournament she scored an important goal during the decisive match against Thailand for qualification for the Games.북한 여자축구, 런던올림픽 본선 진출 She won with the national team the gold medal at the 2014 Asian Games.[인천AG 윤송미 '몸싸움에선 밀리지 않아요'[포토][인천AG 패스하고 빠르게 돌아 들어가는 윤송미]윤송미 '죽기 살기로 돌격' [MK포토한국, 북한에 0-1 밀린 채 전반 종료 ==International goals== No. Date Venue Opponent Score Result Competition 1\. 11 September 2011 Jinan Olympic Sports Center, Jinan, China 2–0 5–0 2012 Summer Olympics qualification ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1992 births Category:North Korean footballers
title: Yun Song-mi
